text: Hashim Sayed Isa Hasan Radhi Hashim is a Bahraini footballer who currently plays for Bahraini Premier League club Al-Riffa as a Forward. == Club career == === Malkiya === On 12 February 2018, Hashim scored two goals against Al- Suwaiq in his club debut in the AFC Cup. === Al-Riffa === On 19 June 2019, Al- Riffa announced the signing of Sayed Hashim with a 4-year contract. ==References== ==External links== *Kooora profile *National Football Teams profile Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Bahraini footballers Category:Bahrain international footballers Category:Riffa SC players Category:Malkiya Club players Category:Footballers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Bahrain
title: Sayed Hashim Isa
